message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique product to you. This product holds immense value to me and I believe it could be equally beneficial for you. Given its significance, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the intrinsic value I place on it. I understand its worth to you might be $10,000, but I hope you'll consider the additional benefits and the opportunity it presents. I look forward to your positive response. Best regards, Alice
